doc:
Matthew Garber https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Matthew_Garber 0 Matthew Adam Garber (25 March 1956 – 13 June 1977) was a British child actor, best known for his role as Michael Banks in the 1964 film Mary Poppins. He also starred in two other Disney films, The Three Lives of Thomasina and The Gnome-Mobile, all three times appearing alongside actress Karen Dotrice. Ten years after his retirement, Garber contracted hepatitis, which later affected his pancreas. He died of pancreatitis at the age of 21. Matthew_Adam_Garber ( 25_March_1956 – 13_June_1977 ) was a_British_child_actor , best_known for his_role as Michael_Banks in the_1964_film_Mary_Poppins . He also starred in two_other_Disney_films , The_Three_Lives of Thomasina and The_Gnome-Mobile , all_three_times appearing alongside actress_Karen_Dotrice . Ten_years after his_retirement , Garber contracted hepatitis , which later affected his_pancreas . He died of pancreatitis at the_age of 21 .
